metadata.title: CVE-2015-2933 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Html class in MediaWikibefore 1.19.24, 1.2x before 1.23.9, and 1.24.x before 1.24.2 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a LanguageConvertersubstitution string when using a language variant.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2933` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
